name: Everlasting Golden Gunner
description:
Hey guys!

This is Everlasting Golden Gunner, an action-platformer with a challenging
gameplay that give a twist on ideas from risk of rain and some roguelike games to bring you up a new world where you will have to kill enemies to
defend the workers of a mining corporation that mines on the ENTIRE GALAXY.

Our protagonist is the legendary Golden Gunner who is known by his skill at weapons and his incredible aiming. Soon in future updates we will find that the earth is not as we thought it would be, it hides something big.

This game is made by me, Illumina, as a second project of an Indie Deveveloper willing to do more updates (this game is still in development) on this game, and maybe new other games :) . From programming and coding to sound effects, I've made this entire game by myself (with a little help on music and some sound effects).

To know more about updates and stuff that will be going on heres my social media:
